segments.text: I find myself looking between the serene outside and the chaotic inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, a perfectly manicured garden path is visible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything outside looks calm and utterly peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's such a stark contrast to the scene unfolding within this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just spewing water everywhere, creating a spreading wet hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, bless their hearts, are tempting fate with that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I keep imagining the worst-case scenarios playing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if the boy slips on the wet floor after he falls off the stool?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Or the woman steps into the puddle and her attention suddenly snaps?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It gives me a real sense of impending doom for this household.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: All these minor details are leading up to something much larger, I just know it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite unsettling to watch it all unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR
